{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16812v1", "title": "The rigidity statement in the Horowitz-Myers conjecture", "summary": "In this paper, we give an alternative proof of the Horowitz-Myers conjecture
in dimension $3 \leq N \leq 7$. Moreover, we show that a metric that achieves
equality in the Horowitz-Myers conjecture is locally isometric to a
Horowitz-Myers metric.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-04-23T15:31:10Z"}
